description: You siphon the residual energy from the last spell you cast into one weapon you're wielding. Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an extra 1d6 damage of a type depending on the school of the spell you just cast. Abjuration force damage Conjuration or Transmutation the same type as the weapon Divination, Enchantment, or Illusion mental damage Evocation a type the spell dealt, or force damage if the spell didn't deal damage Necromancy negative damage
